ActorFrame.OnCommand:
%function(self)
self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y)
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].left then self:rotationz(90) self:x(SCREEN_LEFT+190+GetLifebarAdjustment())
elseif CustomMods[PLAYER_1].right then self:rotationz(90) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-160-GetLifebarAdjustment()+SCREEN_WIDTH/2)
else self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH/4) end
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].solo then self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH/2) end
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].spin then self:spin() self:effectclock('beat') self:effectmagnitude(0,0,45) end
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].spinreverse then self:spin() self:effectclock('beat') self:effectmagnitude(0,0,-45) end
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].vibrate then self:vibrate() end
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].wag then self:wag() self:effectclock('beat') end
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].downward then self:addy(20) end
end

AutoActor.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:diffusealpha(0) if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].spin or CustomMods[PLAYER_1].spinreverse then self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT*2) self:fadetop(.2) self:fadebottom(.2) else
if CustomMods[PLAYER_1].right or CustomMods[PLAYER_1].left then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_2) then self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_WIDTH/1.6) self:fadetop(.2) self:fadebottom(.2) else self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.75) end elseif CustomMods[PLAYER_1].vibrate or CustomMods[PLAYER_1].wag then self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) else self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT) end end
self:decelerate(.3) self:diffusealpha(DarkenPercent(PLAYER_1)) end
